resources.string: Experience the future of Android UI automation with intelligent source mapping and self-healing tests.
Inspect your project source code directly through the view hierarchy using advanced code heuristics and source mapping.
Precise gestures with window inset awareness and Unicode text input via virtual keyboards for comprehensive testing.
Automatically write tests with configurable credentials and experiment settings. Get highly actionable errors and self-healing capabilities.
Built by Zillow and hosted on GitHub. Join our community and start automating your Android tests today!
